sense.def:
To have an understanding of something
pomeni vedeti, kako nekaj deluje ali kaj pomeni.

seg.quote: I doubt whether he had any real understanding of Shakespeare.
The job requires an understanding of Spanish.

sense.def:
To be understanding towards someone
pomeni biti prijazen do nekoga in mu spregledati napake.

seg.quote: I have always thought you were an understanding person.

sense.def:
Understanding between people
pomeni, da se dve osebi vedeta prijateljsko med seboj in si zaupata.

seg.quote: What is needed is greater understanding between management and workers.

sense.def:
An understanding
je neuraden dogovor o nečem.

Kadar pristanemo, da nekaj naredimo
on the understanding that something else will be done
, tisto naredimo zato, ker nam je obljubljeno, da bo nekdo drug naredil nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: I signed the contract on the understanding that delivery would be this week.
